column5: Anybody try any of Cabelas real image minnow lures? was thinking of trying some in canada this summer. They have a 30 day money back offer if your not satisfied. They look pretty good but the colors look limited.

I've been using the 3 inch fathead style and they seem to work pretty well, except after a while and a few bites and snags the eyes will fall off. Even without the eye though the lure works well. Very difficult to rig the lure up on a jig though. You need to use a hook or carolina type rig.
They work, but they're expensive and get pretty chewed up after a fish or two. Better bet is Berkley Power Grubs.
